metadata.description: Official Apify agent skills for web scraping, data extraction, and automation

plugins.name: apify-lead-generation
plugins.description: Generate B2B/B2C leads by scraping Google Maps, websites, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, and Google Search using Apify Actors

plugins.name: apify-brand-reputation-monitoring
plugins.description: Track reviews, ratings, sentiment, and brand mentions across Google Maps, Booking.com, TripAdvisor, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok

plugins.name: apify-competitor-intelligence
plugins.description: Analyze competitor strategies, content, pricing, ads, and market positioning across Google Maps, Booking.com, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok

plugins.name: apify-market-research
plugins.description: Analyze market conditions, geographic opportunities, pricing, consumer behavior, and product validation across Google Maps, Facebook, Instagram, Booking.com, and TripAdvisor

plugins.name: apify-influencer-discovery
plugins.description: Find and evaluate influencers for brand partnerships, verify authenticity, and track collaboration performance across Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and TikTok

plugins.name: apify-trend-analysis
plugins.description: Discover and track emerging trends across Google Trends, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and TikTok to inform content strategy

plugins.name: apify-content-analytics
plugins.description: Track engagement metrics, measure campaign ROI, and analyze content performance across Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and TikTok

plugins.name: apify-audience-analysis
plugins.description: Understand audience demographics, preferences, behavior patterns, and engagement quality across Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok

plugins.name: apify-ultimate-scraper
plugins.description: Universal AI-powered web scraper for any platform. Scrape data from Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, Google Maps, Google Search, Google Trends, Booking.com, and TripAdvisor for lead generation, brand monitoring, competitor analysis, influencer discovery, trend research, and more

plugins.name: apify-actor-development
plugins.description: Develop, debug, and deploy Apify Actors - serverless cloud programs for web scraping, automation, and data processing

plugins.name: apify-actor-commands
plugins.description: Commands for Apify Actor development workflow

plugins.name: apify-actorization
plugins.description: Convert existing projects into Apify Actors - serverless cloud programs. Actorize JavaScript/TypeScript (SDK with Actor.init/exit), Python (async context manager), or any language (CLI wrapper). Use when migrating code to Apify, wrapping CLI tools as Actors, or adding Actor SDK to existing projects.
